content: in this legal case the district court in ljubljana made a decision regarding an inheritance case the deceased person had a widow and a son and the court determined that they are the intestate heirs the widow will receive the real estate money from bank accounts and unpaid pension benefits while the son will receive a car and insurance bonuses the court fee for the procedure was 702 euros and the duration of the procedure was 6 months and 13 days the final resolution involves the division of assets worth 105700 euros the decision was based on the inheritance act and the civil procedure act the parties involved reached an agreement and any disputes will be settled by the ljubljana court the court received a death certificate and is handling the intestate succession the legitimate heirs have agreed to waive the probate hearing and have submitted an inheritance agreement the court has determined the value of the estate and will handle the registration of immovable property the appellant has 15 days to lodge an appeal with the court accompanied by sufficient copies for all parties involved the appeal will be decided by the ljubljana high court the appeal must include a statement of the decision being appealed the grounds for the appeal and must be accompanied by the court fee failure to pay the fee within the specified time limit will result in the appeal being withdrawn the text is dated august 4th 2021 in ljubljana

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, car, insurance bonuses
